jobDescription: Location: Chicago, IL  Duration: 6 months Job Description: Responsible for a transfer of large amounts of data between a legacy data environment and a cloud data environment. Included within those responsibilities are the areas of data access and delivery technologies. Includes expertise in data quality, data organization, metadata, and data profiling. May provide/receive technical support to/from data warehouse teams. Data set sizes could potentially be huge (in excess of 100 million of records).  Demonstrated ability to move from one sequential assignment to the next (work environment and priorities can change quickly depending on business needs). Demonstrated ability to move relational and hierarchical data between environments and across multiple platforms.  5+ years of experience with Financial Services clients  5+ years of experience OLAP, SQL or other major querying tools  No OTJ except for data and systems training  Experience with Python  1+ years in Amazon Web Services (AWS) environment, including S3 Storage and Redshift  Ability to coordinate work with others while involved with multiple work streams  Ability to communicate strategies and processes around data modeling and architecture to cross functional groups and senior levels  Ability to influence multiple levels on highly technical issues and challenges  Srinath Reddy  Phone: (703) 574-3327  Email: srinath@iconma.com
